text: Roger Marcel Cicero Ciceu (6 July 1970 - 24 March 2016Hirnschlag mit 45 Jahren: Roger Cicero ist tot, bild.de, access date 29 March 2016) was a German jazz and pop musician. He was born in Berlin, Germany. Cicero represented Germany at the Eurovision Song Contest 2007 in Helsinki his song Frauen regier'n die Welt (Women rule the world). He finished 19th. Cicero made his movie debut in Hilde (2009) as musician Ricci Blum. Cicero died of a stroke in Hamburg, Germany on 24 March 2016, aged 45. ==References== Category:1970 births Category:2016 deaths Category:Actors from Berlin Category:Deaths from stroke Category:German singers Category:German movie actors
title: Roger Cicero
